document.full_text: an appeals court voted unanimously to reopen a criminal case into charges of the sexual abuse of minors by the rev. fernando karadima, a roman catholic priest.
document.title: the americas: chile: priest sex abuse case re-opened
lines_and_colors: an appeals court voted unanimously to reopen a criminal case into charges of the sexual abuse of minors by the rev. fernando karadima, a roman catholic priest.
